About Me Text:
I'm a Full Stack developer focused on the JavaScript ecosystem. My favorite programming languages are TypeScript and JavaScript, in which I have been creating applications that effectively solve real problems. 
I have an innovative and multifaceted mind. I am always excited to face new challenges and dedicate myself completely to them. 
My constant search is for maximum organization in my projects. I use entrepreneurial approaches, enthusiasm and constructive estimation, guided by strategic metrics to guide my progress.
School Management System Description: This app makes it possible to manage the data of students and employees of a school. Festures made available are based on CRUD operations of students and staff.
Clean Node API Description: API built through a NodeJS server based on the concepts of TDD (Test Driven Development) and SOLID.
Task Mate Description: It consists of a To Do List style system in which tasks to be completed can be handled. In addition, filters are available on such tasks.
Vakinha Burger Description: Vakinha Burger hamburger administration and management application made using the Flutter framework for the web during the DW10 event. The system was built based on Futter Modular and MobX.
